title: Guilford Courthouse National Military Park: Permits & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations              Permits & Reservations       There are no entrance or parking fees at Guilford Courthouse National Military Park.   School or Education Group Reservations Reservations for school groups or other educational groups should be made at least two weeks prior to visit. For additional information concerning reservations call (336) 288-1776.   Special Park Uses (Permits) Special events such as weddings require a Special Use Permit and associated fees. For additional information concerning reservations and permits, visit our permit page or call (336) 288-1776.
